original_text: He caused his power to be with Moses, as Moses raised his arm over the sea. He caused the waters to become separate so that his people could go across. In that way, he caused his name always to be famous.
korean_text: 그의 영광의 팔이 모세의 오른손을 이끄시며 그의 이름을 영원하게 하려 하사 그들 앞에서 물을 갈라지게 하시고

sentences.original_text: He caused his power to be with Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 능력이 모세와 함께 있게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: as Moses raised his arm over the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 바다 위에 팔을 들 때

sentences.original_text: He caused the waters to become separate
so that his people could go across
he caused his name always to be famous
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 이름이 항상 유명하게 되게 하셨다
